text: you
so I stopped by the arista revolution
section of CES today where a lot of new
smart watches were on display there's a
number of the devices that I don't think
are ready for primetime yet specifically
some of the e-ink watches that are black
and white squint screens and don't seem
to really do that much there were some
devices that had more promising features
but seemed too big and too bulky but one
of the things that I found that was
really interesting with a device called
Phillip which is designed for kids and
it's a little green SmartWatch that they
can wrap around their wrists and then
their parents can download an app and
they can track where their kids are and
then call them to come home and I think
this is one of the more promising things
I've seen in this section of CES
